meanings.definition: A group of birds of prey in the family Accipitridae.
meanings.sent1: Buteonines are known for their sharp talons and keen eyesight.
meanings.sent2: I saw a majestic buteonine soaring high in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The buteonines held a meeting to discuss hunting strategies.
meanings.sent4: The buteonines in the forest were like silent guardians watching over the land.
meanings.sent5: The buteonines' hunting skills are unmatched in the avian world.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the buteonines.
meanings.sent1: The buteonine feathers had distinct patterns of brown and white.
meanings.sent2: Her painting captured the essence of buteonine grace and strength.
meanings.sent3: The buteonine fashion show featured earthy tones and natural textures.
meanings.sent4: His buteonine instincts kicked in when he sensed danger nearby.
meanings.sent5: The buteonine landscape was dotted with tall trees and clear skies.
